an4.138:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo nikatthakayo hoti anikatthacitto?
an4.138:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevati.
an4.138:2.3: So tattha kamavitakkampi vitakketi byapadavitakkampi vitakketi vihimsavitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nikatthakayo hoti anikatthacitto.
an4.138:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo anikatthakayo hoti nikatthacitto?
an4.138:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevati.
an4.138:3.3: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyapadavitakkampi vitakketi avihimsavitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anikatthakayo hoti nikatthacitto.
an4.138:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo anikatthakayo ca hoti anikatthacitto ca?
an4.138:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevati.
an4.138:4.3: So tattha kamavitakkampi vitakketi byapadavitakkampi vitakketi vihimsavitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anikatthakayo ca hoti anikatthacitto ca.
an4.138:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo nikatthakayo ca hoti nikatthacitto ca?
an4.138:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevati.
an4.138:5.3: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyapadavitakkampi vitakketi avihimsavitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nikatthakayo ca hoti nikatthacitto ca.
an4.138:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
